summary: This document discusses a planned uprising by opposition groups in Cuba. Members of the UNIDAD REVOLUCIONARIA (UR) reported to the French Embassy in Habana that they were invited to a meeting organized by the DIRECTORIO REVOLUCIONARIO ESTUDIANTIL (DRE) and the MOVIMIENTO REVOLUCIONARIO DEL PUEBLO (MRP) to plan a stage of active warfare. The UR was advised not to participate, but the DRE and MRP planned an uprising for the last days of August, which would result in a general uprising of all internal resistance groups.
title: PLANNED UPRISING BY OPPOSITION GROUPS IN CUBA
